server_join.title: Hello, I'm Utiliboat, a Utility Purpose Discord Bot for all types of servers available.
server_join.description:
I was made by **PillGP#2767** to help you in everyday tasks.

If you want to know more about me, type `u!help`.

[Add me to your server]({0}) | [Check my Github repository]({1}) | [Donate so that I can stay alive 24/7]({2})

help.check_dm: I've sent you a list of my commands in your DMs
help._description: Sends you a private message with all of my commands

missing_manageguild_permission: You need the **"Manage Guild**" permission in order to do this
